predicate.note: Frames file for 'punch' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

roleset.name: to hit or press (a key or a button)

example.name: passive
example.text: The fan said [0] he was punched and kicked [*-1] by one player and that the other broke his jaw with a baseball bat .

example.name: with direction
example.text: We finally rendezvoused with our balloon , which [*T*-94] had come [*-1] to rest on a dirt road amid a clutch of Epinalers who [*T*-95] watched us disassemble our craft -- another half-an-hour of non-flight activity -- that [*T*-96] included the precision routine of [*] yanking the balloon to the ground , punching all the air out of it , rolling it up and cramming it and the basket into the trailer .

example.name: transitive
example.text: Viewers can call a 900 number for additional advice , which [*T*-2] will be tailored [*-1] to their needs based on the numbers [0] they punch [*T*-3] ( `` [*] Press one if you 're pregnant , '' etc . ) .
